channel.title: Help (custom's Weilding Problem)
channel.description: Whenever i weilded the first custom i made it was fine. then i made a new and and the first one i made weilds as my gloves, not my sword. Please if you know help me.

item.title: Help (custom's Weilding Problem)
item.dc:creator: @Steve734 Steve734
item.description:
@Steve734 wrote:

First, go into your server files folder.

Next, go into your Item.java file.

Next, if its a platebody, platelegs, shield, weapon, etc. put it in that part of the file. Type ctrl+f and search whatever it is, like platebody, helmet, etc. then add it to the part that all of the other IDâ€™s are at.

Finally, your done, compile+restart then spawn the item, then it will go in the correct positon.
Hope this helped you

Read full topic
